requirements: Non-competes RESTRICTED - scrutinized closely

Delaware courts closely scrutinize non-competes. Must be necessary to protect legitimate business interest, reasonable in scope/time/geography. Employee must receive something of value beyond continued employment.
Best practice: Use narrowly tailored restrictions, 1 year maximum recommended
Action required: Ensure narrow scope and adequate consideration provided
